N20031109

While executing the JDT/UI refactoring tests if found this in the log

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Nov 09, 2003 22:24:11.567
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Status Line Update".
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Device is disposed
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2538)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2468)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.error(Display.java:656)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.asyncExec(Display.java:474)
	at org.eclipse.ui.progress.UIJob.run(UIJob.java:81)

This was due to a missing disposed check when the display was removed.

Fixed in build >20031110
*** Bug 46359 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
